modular_train.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python3
2 
3 from train_rocket_league import train
4 import yaml
5 import sys
6 import os
7 from multiprocessing import Process
8 
9 if __name__ == '__main__':
10  numEnvsAllowed = 24
11 
12  if len(sys.argv) == 2:
13  numEnvsAllowed = int(sys.argv[1])
14 
15  configFile = os.path.join(os.pardir, 'config', 'rocket_league.yaml')
16  print(os.path.abspath(configFile))
17 
18  file = yaml.load(open(configFile), Loader=yaml.FullLoader)
19  numGroups = len(file["reward"]["win"])
20 
21  for i in range(numGroups):
22  args = (int(numEnvsAllowed / numGroups), 100, 240000000, i)
23  p = Process(target=train, args=args)
24  p.start()
25  print(f'Starting thread {i}/{numGroups}')
